summary: This document is a cover email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) transmitting discovery materials in the case U.S. v Thomas, No. 19 Cr 830. It includes a letter and an attorney's eyes only page, and directs counsel to access the materials via USAfx.
locations: U.S. Attorney's Office, SDNY, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is part of discovery production in the case U.S. v Thomas, No. 19 Cr 830.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York is transmitting discovery materials, including an attorney's eyes only page.
The materials were uploaded to USAfx for access by counsel on October 14, 2020.
